landing.heroDescription: Vamo is where non-technical founders iterate on their product and business in parallel. Chat with AI, track traction, earn rewards, and get instant valuations.
landing.step1Desc: Set up your startup in seconds. Add your project details, link your live app, and start tracking progress.
landing.step2Desc: Chat with Vamo AI to log features shipped, customers added, and revenue earned. Every action earns pineapples.
landing.step3Desc: Receive AI-generated valuations based on your traction. List your project on the marketplace for investors.
landing.feat1Desc: Chat with Vamo AI to log progress, ship features, and get intelligent business analysis in real-time.
landing.feat2Desc: Every feature shipped, customer added, and revenue logged builds your progress score and traction signals.
landing.feat3Desc: Get AI-generated valuations based on your logged progress. List your project for sale on the marketplace.
landing.feat4Desc: Browse and discover startup projects listed by other founders. Find your next acquisition opportunity.
landing.feat5Desc: Earn pineapples for every meaningful action. Redeem them for real rewards like Uber Eats credits.
landing.feat6Desc: Track your startup's journey with detailed activity logs, progress charts, and business metrics.
landing.ctaBannerDesc: Join Vamo and turn your startup idea into a trackable, fundable project.
landing.footerCopy: ¬© 2025 Vamo. Built for founders who ship.

auth.loginDesc: Sign in to continue building your startup
auth.signupDesc: Create an account and start building your startup
